name: Pocong
description:
An entry for GameJamPlus Indonesia 2022, a 48 hours game jam hosted by igg.indonesia - itch.io, I picked 2 out of  the 6 themes, which are, "Easy to Play, Hard to Master" and "Retell a Tale"

A small precision platformer about an Indonesian ghost, pocong.

Jump to the tippy top, and free your entrapped soul.

Controls:

- left / right or W / A: jump (hold to jump higher and further)

- space: interact/confirm

- escape: quit to main menu

How to play:

- Jump and get to the to the tippy top

Credits:

1. Palette - AAP-64 - Adigun A. Polack 

AAP-64 Palette (lospec.com) 


2. Font - m3x6 - by Daniel Linssen

m3x6 by Daniel Linssen (itch.io)

How to run the game:

1. Download .zip file

2. unzip the .zip file

3. run the .exe file in the folder

Your feedback is very appreciated.! (•̀ᴗ•́)و

Thank you! (•̀ᴗ•́)و
